properties.name: craftgate.enabled
properties.description: You can disable beans related Craftgate using property.

properties.name: craftgate.api.url
properties.description: The url for reaching Craftgate services.

properties.name: craftgate.api.authVersion
properties.description: The CraftGate authorization version. If you are not sure what value you should give, you can give V1. Nevertheless If you face an error, you can check their developer websites.

properties.name: craftgate.api.clientVersion
properties.description: The CraftGate client version. If you face an error, you can check their developer websites.

properties.name: craftgate.log.enabled
properties.description: If you want to trace the request calls, you can set true. This is not recommended for the production environment.
